channel.title: A little bit of no-ip help needed
channel.description: Guess what guys?? :| I FINALLY got ny no-ip server w000t!! :cool:, not like any of you care of course.. :mad:. Anyways, when I enable no-ip and my server, it says error connecting to server when I try to log in, but then if I wait a while, then I can log in, any suggestions of what the hell is going on?

item.title: A little bit of no-ip help needed
item.dc:creator: @killah246 Killah246
item.description:
@killah246 wrote:

You add the port in windows firewall
Try using www.dyndns.com
Services > Dynamic DNS > CREATE HOST
You can do it from there
T’is alot easier than no-ip.

Read full topic
item.source: A little bit of no-ip help needed

item.title: A little bit of no-ip help needed
item.dc:creator: @Eportal Eportal
item.description:
@Eportal wrote:

ok dude it works but when I first start no-ip DUC then the server isn’t on even tho I did everything right, but then If i wait then it’s on, is this natural or is this an error? If so, how can I fix it…?

Read full topic
item.source: A little bit of no-ip help needed

item.title: A little bit of no-ip help needed

item.description:
@GuNtRiX wrote:

It maybe your source what are you using?
or your firewall did you turn it off?

Read full topic
